variable.name: F84VY
variable.comment: Visit year for which this form was collected.

variable.name: F84DAYS
variable.comment: Days between randomization and initiation of form

variable.name: CBEABNRM
variable.comment: Were there any abnormal findings during the breast exam? Sub-question of F84 V4 Q6 'CBE exam performed by'

variable.name: NIPRT
variable.comment: Nipple discharge (right) Not collected on all versions of Form 84.

variable.name: NIPLT
variable.comment: Nipple discharge (left) Not collected on all versions of Form 84.

variable.name: SKINRT
variable.comment: Skin involvement (right) Not collected on all versions of Form 84.

variable.name: SKINLT
variable.comment: Skin involvement (left) Not collected on all versions of Form 84.

variable.name: AXILRT
variable.comment: Axillary mass (right) Not collected on all versions of Form 84.

variable.name: AXILLT
variable.comment: Axillary mass (left) Not collected on all versions of Form 84.

variable.name: BRMASSRT
variable.comment: Breast mass (right) Not collected on all versions of Form 84.

variable.name: BRMASSLT
variable.comment: Breast mass (left) Not collected on all versions of Form 84.

variable.name: BRMOBLRT
variable.comment:
Primary mass: mobile (right) Sub-question of F84 V4 Q7.4 'Breast mass right'
Not collected on all versions of Form 84.

variable.name: BRMOBLLT
variable.comment:
Primary mass: mobile (left) Sub-question of F84 V4 Q7.4 'Breast mass left'
Not collected on all versions of Form 84.

variable.name: BRSIZERT
variable.comment:
Primary mass: size (right) Sub-question of F84 V4 Q7.4 'Breast mass right'
Not collected on all versions of Form 84.

variable.name: BRSIZELT
variable.comment:
Primary mass: size (left) Sub-question of F84 V4 Q7.4 'Breast mass left'
Not collected on all versions of Form 84.

variable.name: MASSESRT
variable.comment:
Primary mass: more than one mass (right) Sub-question of F84 V4 Q7.4 'Breast mass right'
Not collected on all versions of Form 84.

variable.name: MASSESLT
variable.comment:
Primary mass: more than one mass (left) Sub-question of F84 V4 Q7.4 'Breast mass left'
Not collected on all versions of Form 84.

variable.name: BRSLFEX
variable.comment: Breast self-exam teaching completed/reinforced

variable.name: BRREF
variable.description: CBE - Referral made for follow-up care
variable.comment: Was referral made for follow-up care (CBE)?

variable.name: CBEREFDY
variable.description: Days from randomization to CBE referral
variable.comment: Sub-question of F84 V4 Q9 'Referral made for follow-up care'

variable.name: BRFINRT
variable.comment: CBE final follow-up results (right) Not collected on all versions of Form 84.

variable.name: BRFINLT
variable.comment: CBE final follow-up results( left) Not collected on all versions of Form 84.
